actions.desc: The kryt makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its quarterstaff.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (2d8 + 5) bludgeoning damage
actions.name: Bite

actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d6 + 5) bludgeoning damage, or 9 (1d8 + 5) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands.
actions.name: Quarterstaff

reactions.desc: When a kryt is attacked by a creature it can see within 30 feet of it, the kryt can haunt the creature with a vision of the creatureâ€™s death. The haunted creature has disadvantage on its next attack roll. Undead creatures and creatures that are unable to be killed are immune to this reaction.
reactions.name: Haunting Vision

special_abilities.desc: The kryt can hold its breath for 15 minutes.
special_abilities.name: Hold Breath

special_abilities.desc: The kryt catches a glimpse of the immediate future and gains advantage on one attack roll or one saving throw.
special_abilities.name: Prophetic Vision (1/Turn)
